Perceptor:

"'cause she's aa maximal,  we captured her due she's Rodimus's 
wife"replied Perceptor after that he told Chimeara all story of 
BlackStorm and he eneded "It seems that maximals had found out how 
neeutralice my virus and reprograme her, but by the pit and all 
Predacons, if we capture her once more time, I promised that maximals 
not will haave her back aggain"
